languages.text: {n}Под пронзительным взглядом Иокасты Джиневри нервно поправляет броню.{/n} "Под мою ответственность труп попал в таком виде. Но я... Я не смогла выяснить имя офицера, обнаружившего его. На палубе был такой бардак, что я решила... разобраться с этим позже".

{n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."
languages.original_text: {n}Под пронзительным взглядом Иокасты Джиневри нервно поправляет броню.{/n} "Под мою ответственность труп попал в таком виде. Но я... Я не смогла выяснить имя офицера, обнаружившего его. На палубе был такой бардак, что я решила... разобраться с этим позже".

traits.locale_text: {n}Under Jocasta's piercing gaze, Jinevra nervously adjusts her Armor.{/n} "The corpse came under my responsibility already looking like that. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess, I decided to I would deal with it later."

{n}Hrotko nervously adjusts his armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The body was already in that state when I arrived. After we are done with the pipewarden, I'll find the junior officer who was the first on the scene and question them thoroughly."

{n}Under Jocasta's piercing gaze, Jinevra nervously adjusts her armour.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."

{n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."

languages.text: {n}Jinevri ajuste nerveusement son armure sous le regard accablant de Sauerback.{/n} « Il était déjà dans cet état à mon arrivée, mais... je n'ai pas réussi à identifier l'officier qui l'avait découvert. Une telle panique régnait sur le pont que j'ai décidé de remettre ça à plus tard. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri ajuste nerveusement son armure sous le regard accablant de Sauerback.{/n} « Il était déjà dans cet état à mon arrivée, mais... je n'ai pas réussi à identifier l'officier qui l'avait découvert. Une telle panique régnait sur le pont que j'ai décidé de remettre ça à plus tard. »

languages.text: {n}Jinevri se ajusta nerviosa la armadura bajo la penetrante mirada de Sauerback.{/n} «El cadáver ya estaba así cuando llegó a mi supervisión, pero... no pude encontrar el nombre del oficial que lo recuperó. La cubierta estaba tan desorganizada que decidí posponer la indagación».
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri se ajusta nerviosa la armadura bajo la penetrante mirada de Sauerback.{/n} «El cadáver ya estaba así cuando llegó a mi supervisión, pero... no pude encontrar el nombre del oficial que lo recuperó. La cubierta estaba tan desorganizada que decidí posponer la indagación».

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克锐利的目光盯着杰尼娃，杰尼娃紧张地整理着她的护甲。{/n}“当我发现那具尸体的时候，它就已经是这个样子了，但我……我没查到发现尸体的人到底是谁。当时的情况实在是太乱了，于是我打算先忙完这边的事情之后再去查清楚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克锐利的目光盯着杰尼娃，杰尼娃紧张地整理着她的护甲。{/n}“当我发现那具尸体的时候，它就已经是这个样子了，但我……我没查到发现尸体的人到底是谁。当时的情况实在是太乱了，于是我打算先忙完这边的事情之后再去查清楚。”

languages.text: {n}ジネヴリは緊張した様子で、ザウアーバックの鋭い視線を浴びながらもアーマーを整えた。{/n}「あの死体は、私が見たときには既にあのような状態になっていました。ですが…死体を発見した士官の名前はわかりませんでした。甲板が混乱していたため、後で処理することにしたのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジネヴリは緊張した様子で、ザウアーバックの鋭い視線を浴びながらもアーマーを整えた。{/n}「あの死体は、私が見たときには既にあのような状態になっていました。ですが…死体を発見した士官の名前はわかりませんでした。甲板が混乱していたため、後で処理することにしたのです」

languages.text: {n}Jinevri nestelt unter Sauerbacks stechendem Blick nervös an ihrer Rüstung herum.{/n} "Die Leiche sah schon so aus, als sie in meine Zuständigkeit fiel. Aber ich ... Ich konnte den Namen des Offiziers nicht ermitteln, der sie entdeckt hatte. Auf dem Deck war die Hölle los, also beschloss ich, mich später damit zu befassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."

Ich konnte den Namen des Offiziers nicht ermitteln, der sie entdeckt hatte. Auf dem Deck war die Hölle los, also beschloss ich, mich später damit zu befassen."

languages.text: {n}Jinevri, Sauerback'in delici bakışları altında gergince zırhını düzeltiyor.{/n} "Ceset, gözetimime verildiğinde zaten bu vaziyetteydi. Fakat... Onu bulan subayın ismini alamadım. Güverte öyle bir karmaşa içindeydi ki bu hususla sonra ilgilenmeye karar verdim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri nervously adjusts her armour under Sauerback's piercing gaze.{/n} "The corpse was already looking like that when it came under my purview. But I... I could not get the name of the officer who discovered it. The deck was such a mess that I decided I would deal with it later."
